name: Customised characters test
description:
Character customisation test is here!!! (Early develop)

💠 Features 💠 

🔷 3 hair, eyes, skin, and clothe colour to choose! 

🔷 Major colour for the hair, clothe and eyes were blue, grey/white, and gold while the skin are white, black, and brown.

 🔸It was 5/3 hours making those things. 

Link° (You can see her tutorial here) - https://youtu.be/6pNWrjbDwIU 

🔷 Name input 

Link° - https://www.renpy.org/doc/html/input....

🔷 screen codes! 

 Link° - https://www.renpy.org/doc/html/screen... 

💠 I owned the art

 ⚠ Please DO NOT trace or steal my art unless trace practice HOWEVER I FORBIDDEN you to post it online. ⚠  

This test is early developed,  and I don't know what's the reason why Ren'py is like that if you download and play the test, you might notice the idle and hover were not in timing but I hope it will fix soon. Ren'py 8  I used.
